PAD_Graveyard.synopsis: VB on entering the graveyard outside of Haven. Favors a Dark Urge line.

PAD_DeadDruids.synopsis: Party comments on the remains of the battle with Ketheric from 100 years ago.Halsin in particular comments on how the forces from the Emerald Grove were here.
PAD_DeadDruids.how_to_trigger: loadlevel SCL_Main_A and then go to -24.5, 35.5, -5.5 and walk around to trigger the VB.

PAD_ShadowlandDevastation.synopsis: Party comments on just how destroyed the landscape is in parts of the Shadowcurse.Gale inparticular notes how the tectonic plates have even shifted.

PAD_Graveyard_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Graveyard_0.text: Victims of the shadow curse. At least they were afforded a burial.

PAD_Graveyard_1.speaker: Player
PAD_Graveyard_1.text: Victims of the shadow curse. At least they were afforded a burial.

PAD_DeadDruids_0.speaker: Player
PAD_DeadDruids_0.text: There was a battle here once - a large one.

PAD_ShadowlandDevastation_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ShadowlandDevastation_0.text: Hells. The curse has torn open the ground itself...
